Rule Definition: This must be an integer and numeric value of the integer must match an entry in the D-TRO user code list
Error Message “name”: Invalid 'Current Traffic regulation authority current owner'
Error Message “message”: Current Traffic regulation authority maintaining this D-TRO (SWA-like code)
Error Message “rule”: Current TRA must be a valid SWA-like code and known to the D-TRO Service; the TRA code must correspond with the appropriate App-ID

Rule Definition: This must be an array of integers, comma separated, and numeric value(s) must match an entry in the D-TRO user code list
Error Message “message”: Traffic regulation authorities who roads are affected by this D-TRO
Error Message “rule”: TRA affected must be a valid SWA-like code and known to the D-TRO Service; the TRA

Rule Definition: This must be an integer, and numeric value must match an entry in the D-TRO user code list
Error Message “message”: Traffic regulation authority originally creating this D-TRO (SWA-like code)
Error Message “rule”: TRA creator must be a valid SWA-like code and known to the D-TRO Service; the TRA

Rule Definition: This must be a date in the past
Error Message “message”: Indicates the date the USRN reference was last updated,lastUpdateDate' must be of type 'System.DateTime', and shall not be in the future

Rule Definition: This must be an integer representing the ID of the Unique Street Reference Number that appears in the National Street Gazetteer
Error Message “rule”: usrn' value should be between 0 and 99999999 and specified as an integer (no leading zeros). This shall correspond to a value found in the National Street Gazetteer

Rule Definition: shall be >1900 and less than or equal to current year value
end must be later than start if present
End must be later than start
End date must be later than or equal to start date
